title: How to Unlock All Songs in Rock Band

steps.headline: Put Rock Band in the slot and turn it on.
Pound out the following note sequence if on drums, or on guitar push the following fret buttons quickly in this order: Red, Yellow, Blue, Red, Red, Blue, Blue, Red, Yellow, Blue.
Do it again, faster, correctly, or perhaps slower, if nothing happens.
steps.description: If done correctly a box will pop up telling you that it worked.

text: Put Rock Band in the slot and turn it on.  Get on drums or guitar.  Pound out the following note sequence if on drums, or on guitar push the following fret buttons quickly in this order: Red, Yellow, Blue, Red, Red, Blue, Blue, Red, Yellow, Blue.  Do it again, faster, correctly, or perhaps slower, if nothing happens. If done correctly a box will pop up telling you that it worked.
